document_data.mainbody:
ola was an Adept of the Absolute, stationed in the Moonrise Towers during the late 15 century DR.
Mola wore the uniform armor of an Adept of the Absolute – a night-blue armored garb and a cowled high-raising helmet. He had a dark green skin and fur tone, and his face had thick bloated dark veins – the evidence of an illithid tadpole infection.
In the , Adept Mola was among those who joined the new religion that sprang in the Western Heartlands. He was stationed within the Moonrise Towers, along the stairwell that led up to its second floor. The fortress was controlled by the Absolutes warlord – General Ketheric Thorm. Like many other members of the cult, Molas fate remained unknown as he couldve perished in battle when the High Harper Jaheira and her True Soul allies stormed the Moonrise.
